com.skayani.brickbreaker.states

Class PlayState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.State
      • com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.PlayState

  • public class PlayState
extends State
    PlayState class that is instantiated when user presses a level from LevelSelectState

    • Method Detail

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput()
        Method to record user movement input. Accelerometer readings are recorded if acceleratorAvail == true. Otherwise, keyboard recordings (left key and right key) are recorded.
        Specified by:
        handleInput in class State

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Method called to constantly check user input as well as game state changes such as if the user has crushed all the bricks or if the user has crushed a particular brick on the screen.
        Specified by:
        update in class State
        Parameters:
        delta - Time difference between two frames

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sb)
        Method called to render background, pause button, player score, and brick objects onto the screen.
        Specified by:
        render in class State
        Parameters:
        sb - SpriteBatch class instance to render objects

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Method called when switched from PlayState to another game state to free memory allocation.
        Specified by:
        dispose in class State
